title: O rituálních rostlinách
content:
O rituálních rostlinách

The book allows one to recognize allspice root, ergot seeds, wolfsbane, mandrake, han, hops, and mistletoe. It also describes the methods for obtaining alchemical substances from them.

An herbarium dedicated to ritual plants, providing knowledge required to recognize them and obtain alchemical ingredients from them.

Zápisy do Deníku

Ingredience:

Chmelové šišky
Jmelí
Kořen mandragory
Námel
Nové koření
Vlákno han
Vlčí mor
Cena
